metadata.title: CVE-2021-47501 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  i40e: Fix NULL pointer dereference in i40e_dbg_dump_desc  When trying to dump VFs VSI RX/TX descriptors using debugfs there was a crash due to NULL pointer dereference in i40e_dbg_dump_desc. Added a check to i40e_dbg_dump_desc that checks if VSI type is correct for dumping RX/TX descriptors.
